column1: .@RandyLudlow, problem even worse. My own mom with heart/lung issues in nursing home. Has had 2 911 surgeries this year & several ER visits. Can’t get tested for Coronavirus due to shortage. Meanwhile, #CaseWestern decides to donate 10,000 test kits... to Uganda. Seriously? @cwru

Shameful rudderless ship in Ohio! 3 MONTHS INTO #coronavirus, Health Dir admits there is still not a plan. Vulnerable nursing homes still ignored even though in Feb they were to be Priority 1. Meanwhile, you can get tested at a drive thru. ⁦@JMBorchardt⁩ ⁦@jbalmert⁩
